name: Zombie City (itch) (Fabiulous Games)
description:
You're the only human left in a city haunted by zombies. 

Kill them all to save the city and, most importantly, yourself.

Zombie city is a fast-paced FPS in which the player has to literally "cut corners" in the city in order to escape the evil zombies seeking his delicious human flesh.

This game was created in just a few days by the italian game dev studio Fabiulous Games for the "Finish your game" Jam hosted by Portland Indie Game Squad.

If you'd like this to become a complete, commercial game in the future please leave a positive review below and share your thoughts about the game. Your support really means a lot and this game's future depends on it! Thank you!
